mapper.insert: insert into accounts ( username, password, role ) value (#{username}, #{password}, #{role})

insert into students ( account_id, name, student_id, class_number, email, phone ) value ( (select id from accounts where username = #{studentId}), #{name}, #{studentId}, #{classNumber}, #{email}, #{phone} )
mapper.select:
select s.id, s.account_id, s.name, s.student_id, s.class_number, s.email, s.phone, a.created_at from students s join accounts a ON s.account_id = a.id
a.id=#{id}
